title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, and knot stitches with cut work with needle-made fillings on plain weave foundation
description: Sampler scattered with flowers and birds embroidered in many colored silks. Central medallion in gold with blue serrated edge and a bow. Several dogs, perhaps poodles, appear amongst the flowers.
name: Sampler
